Topizzy
https://topizzy.xyz/

Summary
Topizzy lets users buy mobile airtime instantly using USDC on Base.

Key Features
- Airtime top-ups using USDC on Base
- Supported countries: Kenya, Uganda, Tanzania, Rwanda, South Africa
- Wallets: MetaMask (EOA) and Coinbase Smart Wallet (Base App)

Support
- WhatsApp: +254743913802
- Telegram: https://t.me/+_doTkG0WfSQzNjFk
- Twitter: https://x.com/topizzy_
- Linkedin: https://www.linkedin.com/company/topizzy/

Important Pages
